text: Mongolia participated in the 9th Asian Games, officially known as the XI Asiad held in Delhi, India from 12 November to 4 December 1982. Mongolia ranked 9th in overall medal table with 3 gold medals in this edition of the Asiad. ==Medal summary== ===Medals by sport=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! width=200|Sport |bgcolor=gold width=60|Gold || bgcolor=silver width=60|Silver || bgcolor=#cc9966 width=70|Bronze ! width=60|Total |- |align=left|Wrestling ||bgcolor=#fffcaf| 2||bgcolor=#e5e5e5| ||bgcolor=#eecc99| || |- |align=left|Boxing ||bgcolor=#fffcaf| ||bgcolor=#e5e5e5| ||bgcolor=#eecc99| || |- |align=left|Boxing ||bgcolor=#fffcaf| ||bgcolor=#e5e5e5| ||bgcolor=#eecc99| || |- !
